itemDescription: British earl, politician, military intelligence officer (1906-1997)

wikipedia_page.main: William Francis Hare, 5th Earl of Listowel,  (28 September 1906 – 12 March 1997), styled Viscount Ennismore between 1924 and 1931, was an Anglo-Irish peer and Labour politician. He was the last Secretary of State for India as well as the last Governor-General of Ghana.
